title: Disposable AirPods? Erdogan Plays Dirty? 12.18.19
itunes:title: Disposable AirPods? Erdogan Plays Dirty? 12.18.19
description:
In episode 538, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Maggie Maye to discuss Hallmark pulling the Zola ad featuring a same-sex wedding, impeachment updates, the Turkish president getting angry that America acknowledged the Armenian genocide, a K-POP star losing 33 pairs of AirPods, Italian soccer's anti-racism campaign, Instagram attempting to fight bullying in comments, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. 11 Hallmark Christmas Movie Romances That Are Actually A Complete Nightmare
  2. Hallmark Channel Pulls Zola Ads Featuring Brides Kissing
  3. Group upset by Geico's 'bestiality' ad
  4. A Marvel X-Man has comics' first gay wedding as DC plans to out a hero
  5. Why Did Hallmark Have to Be Told That Anti-LGBTQ Bigotry Leveled at the Zola Ad Was Wrong?
  6. Democrats lay out case for Wednesday Trump impeachment vote
  7. More On-the-Fence Democrats Back Impeachment of Trump
  8. Impeachment hurts but Teflon Trump thrives
  9. AP count: Majority of House supports Trump’s impeachment
  10. Letters from an American: December 16, 2019
  11. President Trump has made 15,413 false or misleading claims over 1,055 days
  12. Senate passes resolution recognizing Armenian genocide
  13. Turkish president threatens to recognise US genocide of Native Americans in response to Armenia ruling
  14. A member of the popular South Korean boy band BTS says he's lost 33 pairs of AirPods
  15. Italian Soccer Officials Combat Racism Using...Racism
  16. Our Progress on Leading the Fight Against Online Bullying
  17. WATCH: Rezzett - Worst Ever Contender

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
